article_title: Georgetown Sheriff's Office investigating shooting in Greentown - Live5News.com
article_text:
Authorities with the Georgetown County Sheriff’s Office are asking for the public’s help with any information about shots fired in the Greentown Community of Georgetown County.

Around 4:00 a.m. on February 27, Georgetown County Sheriff’s Deputies responded to a report of shots fired at 560 Greentown Road in Georgetown.

Once on scene, sheriff’s deputies determined three male victims had sustained injuries.

One victim has died from injuries sustained at the scene.

Georgetown County Sheriff’s Investigators are currently investigating this incident.

Anyone with information on this incident is asked to contact the Georgetown County Sheriff’s Office at 843-546-5101.

Anonymous tips can also be sent by using Text-A-Tip. Just dial 274637 from any text enabled cell phone, and text the word “GCSOTIP” followed by your message.
